thread.title: 'Beware Of Jews' Sign Appears Near Synagogue In Stamford Hill, North London
thread.title_full: 'Beware Of Jews' Sign Appears Near Synagogue In Stamford Hill, North London

author: Chris York
title: 'Beware Of Jews' Sign Appears Near Synagogue In Stamford Hill, North London
text:
'Beware Of Jews' Sign Appears Near Synagogue In Stamford Hill, North London 'Despicable, nasty behaviour.' 15/03/2017 07:48 Chris York Senior Editor, Huffington Post UK 
Police have launched an investigation into a ‘Beware of Jews’ sign that appeared on a lamppost near a North London synagogue. 
The sign depicts a man in a traditional fedora hat and was spotted by a neighbourhood watch group in Stamford Hill on Tuesday. 
A triangular sign with a red outline normally indicates danger on British roads. #Shomrim reported to @MPSHackney and @HackneyCouncil this offensive 'Beware of Jews' sign which was fixed onto a lamppost in #StamfordHill pic.twitter.com/mj8AfQTSSu — Shomrim N.E. London (@Shomrim) March 14, 2017 
Hackney Council is to remove the sign on Wednesday morning. 
Labour’s Diane Abbott, MP for the area, called the sign “disgusting”. — Diane Abbott MP (@HackneyAbbott) March 14, 2017 
Barry Bard, from the group who spotted the sign , said: “The people of Stamford Hill are very sadly used to instances of anti-Semitic hate crime, but most of those times it will be verbal abuse or even assault. 
“The person who planned [this sign] has obviously gone to an effort to cause alarm and distress to local people.” Despicable, nasty behaviour that has absolutely no place in our community https://t.co/TtlUfsVJO7 — David Lammy (@DavidLammy) March 14, 2017 How did we get to a 'Beware of Jews' sign happening? It's 2017.
